ThingDef.label: primitive axe
ThingDef.description: A rudimentary cutting tool crafted from natural materials like stone, flint, or bone. Featuring a sharp, wedge-shaped blade securely attached to a wooden or bone handle, it embodies early human innovation in woodworking and survival. Used for chopping wood, shaping materials, and various tasks requiring efficient cutting, it represents an essential tool in ancient civilizations and early human societies.

ThingDef.label: primitive medical kit
ThingDef.description: A primitive medical kit that predominantly consists of rudimentary bandaging material; strips of cloth, leaves, or other natural materials, used to cover and protect wounds or injuries. These bandages are rudimentary in nature, lacking modern adhesive or sterile properties, and are typically secured by tying or wrapping. While basic, they serve the fundamental purpose of providing some level of protection and support to the injured area.

ThingDef.label: primitive pickaxe
ThingDef.description: A rugged hand tool fashioned from durable materials such as wood, bone, or stone. Characterized by a pointed or chiseled end affixed to a sturdy handle, it serves as a versatile implement for digging, breaking up soil, and extracting minerals or resources. Reflecting early human ingenuity, it embodies the essential tool for survival and resource gathering in primitive environments.

ThingDef.label: straw broom
ThingDef.description: A traditional cleaning tool composed of straw or natural fibers bundled together. With its simple yet effective design, the straw broom efficiently sweeps dirt, dust, and debris from floors and surfaces. Known for its versatility and durability, it remains a staple in household cleaning routines, offering a timeless solution for tidying indoor and outdoor spaces with ease.

ThingDef.label: simple comb
ThingDef.description: A simple yet effective grooming tool designed for use in taming and caring for animals. Crafted from basic materials such as bone or wood, this comb features strategically placed teeth to gently untangle fur and remove debris, promoting the health and well-being of domesticated creatures. With its rudimentary design and practical functionality.

ThingDef.label: mallet
ThingDef.description: A simple yet versatile tool featuring a solid head, typically made of wood, rubber, or metal, attached to a sturdy handle. Designed for delivering controlled force without damaging delicate surfaces, it serves various purposes in woodworking and construction, offering precision and effectiveness in tasks requiring gentle yet impactful percussion.

ThingDef.label: mortal and pestle
ThingDef.description: A traditional culinary tool consisting of a sturdy bowl (mortar) and a blunt, club-shaped instrument (pestle). Used for grinding, crushing, and mixing herbs, spices, and other ingredients, it offers a timeless method for preparing flavorful concoctions and unlocking the aromas and flavors of various substances through manual pulverization.

ThingDef.label: parchment
ThingDef.description: A durable material made from specially prepared animal skin, typically sheep, goat, or calf. Through a meticulous process of cleaning, stretching, and drying, parchment becomes smooth and resilient, suitable for writing, drawing, or painting. Widely used historically for manuscripts, legal documents, and artwork, parchment embodies a timeless medium prized for its longevity and elegance in preserving written or visual creations.

ThingDef.label: simple tools set
ThingDef.description: The simple leather-bound toolset is a collection of essential implements crafted for basic manual tasks, encompassing a chisel, a small hammer, and a file. Encased within a durable leather sheath, these tools are designed to facilitate precision workmanship in various materials, such as wood or metal.

ThingDef.label: axe
ThingDef.description: A robust cutting tool meticulously crafted through the process of forging, where metal is heated, shaped, and hammered into its final form. Featuring a high-quality steel blade securely affixed to a sturdy wooden or metal handle, the forged axe embodies superior strength and durability. Renowned for its sharp edge and balanced weight distribution, it excels in tasks such as chopping wood, shaping timber, and wilderness survival, making it an essential tool for lumberjacks, outdoorsmen, and craftsmen alike.

ThingDef.label: Beaker
ThingDef.description: The drug synthesis beaker is a laboratory vessel designed and manufactured specifically for the synthesis of pharmaceutical compounds. Constructed with meticulous attention to detail, it is engineered to meet the stringent requirements of chemical laboratories.

ThingDef.label: broom
ThingDef.description: A household cleaning tool consisting of a bundle of stiff bristles or fibers attached to a handle. Used for sweeping dirt, dust, and debris from floors and other surfaces, the broom is a staple in maintaining cleanliness and tidiness in homes, offices, and outdoor spaces. Its simple yet effective design allows for efficient removal of unwanted particles, making it an essential tool for everyday cleaning tasks.

ThingDef.label: cleaver
ThingDef.description: A heavy-duty kitchen knife characterized by a broad, rectangular blade with a thick spine and a sharp edge. Designed for chopping through tough cuts of meat and bone with ease, the cleaver offers precision and power in food preparation tasks. Its weight and sturdy construction allow for efficient cutting, making it a versatile tool in butcher shops, restaurants, and home kitchens alike.

ThingDef.label: hammer
ThingDef.description: A versatile hand tool featuring a heavy head attached to a sturdy handle, typically made of wood, metal, or fiberglass. Used for driving nails, breaking objects, and shaping materials, the hammer is a fundamental tool in construction, carpentry, and general household tasks. With its simple yet effective design, it delivers controlled force and precision, making it indispensable for a wide range of applications.

ThingDef.label: hammer and chisel
ThingDef.description: A classic pairing of tools for precision work in various trades and crafts. The hammer, with its heavy head and sturdy handle, delivers controlled force to the chisel's sharp blade, allowing for accurate cutting, shaping, and carving of materials such as wood, stone, or metal. Together, they form an essential toolkit for sculptors, masons, carpenters, and artisans, facilitating the creation of intricate designs and precise cuts with ease.

ThingDef.label: medical bag
ThingDef.description: A portable collection of essential supplies and equipment used for providing basic first aid and medical care in emergencies or during minor injuries. It typically includes items such as adhesive bandages, gauze pads, antiseptic wipes, medical tape, scissors, tweezers, disposable gloves, pain relievers, and other necessities.

ThingDef.label: pick
ThingDef.description: A formidable hand tool meticulously crafted through the process of forging, where metal is heated, shaped, and tempered to create a robust and durable implement. Characterized by a pointed or chiseled end affixed to a sturdy handle, the forged pick excels in breaking up hard materials such as rock, concrete, or soil. Renowned for its strength and reliability, it is an essential tool in mining, construction, and geological exploration, providing precision and efficiency in challenging environments.

ThingDef.label: shears
ThingDef.description: A specialized tool crafted for efficiently shearing wool and fur from domesticated animals. Designed with precision blades and ergonomic handles, these shears allow colonists to quickly and effectively harvest valuable resources while minimizing stress and discomfort to the animals.

ThingDef.label: spatula
ThingDef.description: A versatile kitchen utensil featuring a flat, broad blade with a long handle. Used for flipping, lifting, and spreading food items such as pancakes, eggs, and frosting, the spatula is a must-have tool for cooking and baking. Its flexible yet sturdy design allows for easy maneuvering and precise control, making it indispensable in culinary tasks that require delicacy and finesse.

ThingDef.label: medical instruments
ThingDef.description: This essential collection features key tools for medical procedures and surgeries. Included are medical needles for injections and fluid aspiration, scalpels for precise incisions, and scissors for cutting sutures and bandages. Crafted with precision and durability, these instruments ensure safe and effective medical interventions, supporting healthcare professionals in delivering quality care to patients with accuracy and precision.

ThingDef.label: Technical Documents
ThingDef.description: Written materials containing detailed information, instructions, specifications, or procedures related to a particular subject or technology. These documents aim to convey complex concepts, processes, or data in a clear and concise manner, typically targeting professionals, engineers, technicians, or individuals with specialized knowledge. Examples include user manuals, engineering drawings, specifications sheets, installation guides, and technical reports. Technical documents play a crucial role in facilitating understanding, communication, and implementation of technical concepts and procedures across various industries and disciplines.

ThingDef.label: basic tool set
ThingDef.description: This versatile set comprises essential tools for woodworking and crafting projects. Included are a screwdriver for fastening and loosening screws, a handsaw for cutting wood with precision, and tongs for gripping and holding materials securely. Crafted with durable materials and ergonomic designs, these tools offer reliability and efficiency, empowering artisans and DIY enthusiasts to tackle various tasks with ease and precision.

ThingDef.label: document_briefcase
ThingDef.description: Meticulously crafted accessory tailored to meet the demands of scholars, academics, and professionals engaged in comprehensive research endeavors. Constructed from durable and high-quality materials, such as leather or nylon, it features a sophisticated yet functional design optimized for the organization, protection, and transport of research materials. This includes academic papers, reference books, journals, electronic devices, and writing implements.

ThingDef.label: chainsaw
ThingDef.description: A powerful handheld cutting tool equipped with a motorized chain and teeth that rotate around a guide bar. Used primarily for felling trees, pruning branches, and cutting lumber, the chainsaw is a versatile and efficient tool in forestry, landscaping, and construction. It enables users to quickly and precisely cut through wood with ease, making it indispensable for tasks requiring fast and precise cutting in outdoor environments.

ThingDef.label: drill
ThingDef.description: A portable, manually-operated tool used for drilling holes in various materials such as wood, metal, and plastic. Consisting of a handle, a chuck to hold drill bits, and a rotating mechanism, the hand drill allows users to exert controlled force to create precise holes without the need for electricity. Versatile and convenient, it's an essential tool for woodworking, DIY projects, and tasks where mobility and simplicity are valued.

ThingDef.label: Drilling pad
ThingDef.description: A versatile drilling assistant pad designed to enhance stability and precision during drilling tasks. Its ergonomic design offers comfort and control, reducing fatigue and improving efficiency. Compatible with various drills, it provides a reliable foundation for accurate drilling, suitable for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.

ThingDef.label: mixer
ThingDef.description: A versatile kitchen appliance designed for combining, blending, and whipping ingredients together to create various culinary concoctions. Featuring a motorized base with multiple speed settings, a mixing bowl, and interchangeable attachments such as beaters, whisks, and dough hooks, the mixer offers convenience and efficiency in food preparation tasks.

ThingDef.label: rock drill
ThingDef.description: A powerful, specialized tool designed for drilling holes into hard materials such as rock, concrete, or masonry. Featuring a pneumatic or hydraulic mechanism, along with hardened drill bits, the rock drill is capable of delivering high impact forces to penetrate tough surfaces efficiently. Widely used in construction, mining, and geological exploration, it enables workers to create boreholes for various purposes, including blasting, anchoring, and exploration.

ThingDef.label: sander
ThingDef.description: A versatile power tool used for smoothing surfaces by abrasion. Featuring a motorized mechanism and abrasive material such as sandpaper, the sander rapidly removes rough spots, imperfections, or old finishes from wood, metal, or other materials

ThingDef.label: electric shears
ThingDef.description: Revolutionize the process of wool and fur harvesting by harnessing the power of electricity to enhance efficiency and productivity. Featuring precision-engineered blades and a motorized mechanism, these advanced shears effortlessly glide through animal coats, swiftly gathering valuable resources with minimal effort from colonists

ThingDef.label: industrial tool set
ThingDef.description: The industrial tool set for crafting is a comprehensive collection of high-quality tools specifically engineered for precision work in manufacturing, construction, or fabrication industries. This robust kit comprises a diverse range of instruments tailored to handle various materials and tasks with efficiency and accuracy.

ThingDef.label: vacuum cleaner
ThingDef.description: A vacuum cleaner, commonly known as a hoover or simply vacuum, is a household appliance designed for the removal of dust, dirt, and debris from floors, carpets, and other surfaces. Typically consisting of a motorized suction mechanism housed within a casing, vacuum cleaners utilize various attachments such as brushes and hoses to agitate and capture particles.

ThingDef.label: Datapad
ThingDef.description: A portable electronic device resembling a tablet, commonly used in science fiction settings. It serves as a versatile tool for data storage, communication, and information retrieval. Featuring a touchscreen interface and wireless connectivity, the datapad allows users to access databases, analyze data, send messages, and perform various tasks on-the-go. With its compact design and advanced functionality, it is an indispensable tool for scientists, engineers, and spacefarers navigating futuristic environments.

ThingDef.label: Medical Stim
ThingDef.description: A potent pharmaceutical agent designed to swiftly alleviate pain and heal physical damage. Administered via injection, this stimulant acts rapidly promotes accelerated healing. With its potent blend of pharmacological compounds, the Medical Stim serves as a vital tool in emergency medical situations, offering colonists a crucial edge in combat scenarios or when facing severe injuries.

ThingDef.label: Multi Tool
ThingDef.description: A state-of-the-art device optimized for material acquisition and crafting in futuristic settings. This advanced tool integrates cutting-edge technology, including molecular scanners, energy manipulators, and nano-fabrication capabilities. It can analyze and harvest raw materials from various sources, manipulate their molecular structures, and fabricate them into desired components or objects. With its compact design and versatile functionality, the sci-fi multitool revolutionizes resource procurement and crafting processes, making it an indispensable tool for explorers, engineers, and artisans across the galaxy.
